title: Transmodal Pedagogy-Based Simulation Learning for Understanding Abstract Art Vocabulary Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: VR-based training for science job-seekers, connecting abstract concepts to visual/spatial manipulation

learning_goals: Learners can recreate abstract art vocabulary (e.g., dynamic balance, organic forms) through 3D spatial manipulation in VR simulations
Learners can connect science experiment data with abstract art expression elements (color contrast, texture variation) to construct visual narratives
Learners can produce digital portfolios explaining abstract scientific concepts by integrating multimodal materials (voice narration, 3D modeling, spatial audio)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
